Package <Unnamed>

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ClientInterface
    Interface that contains methods relating to all forms of clients to be used by the group-based file sharing application.
    FileInterface
    Interface describing the operations that must be supported by the client application used to talk with the file servers.
    GroupInterface
    Interface describing the operations that must be supported by the client application used to talk with the group server.
    UserToken
    A simple interface to the token data structure that will be returned by a group server.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Client
    The Client abstract class holds implementation of connecting to a server, but does not hold specific methods on group server or file server requests.
    Envelope
    Holds messages and or objects that are sent between the client, and the file server or group server.
    FileClient
    Handles connections to the FileServer.
    FileList
    A list of all the files in a particular FileServer.
    FileServer
    Handles connections to the FileClient.
    FileThread
    The thread spawned by FileServer after accepting a connection.
    GroupClient
    Handles connections to the GroupServer.
    GroupList
    A list of all the groups in a particular GroupServer.
    GroupServer
    Handles connections to the GroupClient.
    GroupThread
    The thread spawned by GroupServer after accepting a connection.
    RunFileServer
    Runs the FileServer.
    RunGroupServer
    Runs the GroupServer.
    Server
    The Server abstract class holds implementation of accepting connections from a Client, but does not hold specific methods on group client or file client demands.
    ShareFile
    This class holds the file representation for files in the FileServer.
    Token
    The implementation of the UserToken.
    UserCommands
    UserCommands.java is a command-line interface that bridges the gap between the user and the group and file servers.
    UserList
    A list of all the users in a particular GroupServer.
